q: Eric Schmidt , who told CNN last year that people who don't want their homes photographed for Google Street View could`` just move.'' Eric Schmidt also passed along this comforting gem to The Atlantic: We know where you are. We know where you've been. We can more or less know what you're thinking about. Yikes. Of course, Eric Schmidt has since been kicked upstairs to`` executive chairman,'' and Google co-founder Larry Page will take over day-to-day operations in April.
